Name: GEO Master
About the game: GEO Master is a 3D geography game. This game has different learning modes. You have the opportunity to explore the globe, you can test your knowledge and then compare your score obtained during timed games on the whole planet or on the continent of your choice ! The UNESCO mode allows you to test your knowledge on the most famous monuments and landmarks of our world. The Incredible Facts mode presents you disturbing and amazing facts about the Earth you probably never heard before ! You can also enter 1v1 competitions with your friends in the real-time multiplayer mode, online or on local network. Learn, remember and enter friendly competitions ! There is nothing simpler to learn more about geography while having fun.
